biotools.summary: Tool which aids in the design and quality control of small interfering RNAs (siRNAs) for RNA interference (RNAi) and gene silencing. It evaluates the inhibitory potency of potential siRNA sequences as well as identifying gene regions that have a high silencing capacity.

bioschemas.name: DEQOR
bioschemas.summary: Tool which aids in the design and quality control of small interfering RNAs (siRNAs) for RNA interference (RNAi) and gene silencing. It evaluates the inhibitory potency of potential siRNA sequences as well as identifying gene regions that have a high silencing capacity.
